          <title>
            <string language="sl">Dve nihali povezani z vzmetjo</string>
            <string language="en">Two pendulums coupled with a spring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Pendel verbunden mit einem Frühling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux pendules couplés à un ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois pêndulos acoplados com uma mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due pendoli accoppiati con una molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο εκκρεμή που συνδέονται με ένα ελατήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos péndulos juntados con un resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Sistem dveh enakih ravninskih nihal medsebojno povezanih z vzmetjo in sile pri tem sistemu.</string>
            <string language="en">Observation of system of two equal pendulums coupled   with spring and force present in such system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sistem nihal</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">templates</string>
            <string language="en">templates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung des Systems von zwei gleichen Pendeln
verbunden mit dem Frühling und Kraft vorhanden in solchem System.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observation du système de deux pendules égaux 
couplés au ressort et à la force actuels dans un tel système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observação de um sistema de dois pêndulos 
iguais acoplados com a mola e a força atuais em tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione di un sistema di due pendoli uguali 
accoppiati con la molla e la forza presenti in tale sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση του συστήματος δύο ίσων εκκρεμών που 
συνδέονται με την άνοιξη και τη δύναμη παρούσες σε τέτοιο 
σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación del sistema de dos péndulos iguales
juntados con el resorte y la fuerza presentes en tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
